item.title: Emote
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

client.java look for home thingy or look for a name on the emote tab, it might say something like
triggertele(&&&&, &&&&, ) or something or you can just add whatever you want like startAnimation(##?) or however it goes

edit:well uh search for any of these first

sendFrame126("@whi@GWars", 180); sendFrame126("@whi@Hard!!", 181); sendFrame126("@whi@Jad", 178); sendFrame126("@whi@Barrows",175); sendFrame126("@whi@F Guild",177); sendFrame126("@whi@Mine",182); sendFrame126("@whi@veng",185); sendFrame126("@whi@Thieve",186); sendFrame126("@whi@Wcing",173); sendFrame126("@whi@Train!",179); sendFrame126("@whi@C Mini",187); sendFrame126("@whi@Drags",176); sendFrame126("@whi@Test",168); sendFrame126("@whi@veng!", 189);
and change whatever you want the name too

then

for ancient teles i think change these

[code]sendQuest(“Teleport back home”, 13038);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13042);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13043);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13044);
sendQuest(“50 Combat Teleport”, 13047);
sendQuest(“50 Combat teleport”, 13048);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13051);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13052);
sendQuest(“Jad Teleport”, 13055);
sendQuest(“Hes fucking strong”, 13056);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13059);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13060);
sendQuest(“70 Combat Area”, 13063);
sendQuest(“70 Combat teleport”, 13064);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13067);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13068);
sendQuest(“barrows teleport”, 13071);
sendQuest(“Visit barrows”, 13072);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13076);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13077);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13078);
sendQuest(“Hard guy”, 13097);
sendQuest(“pretty hard guy, hits 99”, 13098);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13101);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13102);

sendQuest(“Ice Mountain”, 13081);
sendQuest(“Ice Queen”, 13082);

sendQuest(“Pk Zone”, 13089);
sendQuest(“Pick A Pk :)”, 13090);

sendQuest(“Hard guy”, 13097);
sendQuest(“He aint no easy guy, hits 99.”, 13098);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13101);
sendQuest("@gre@0/0", 13102);
[/code]

searxch for this to change what they do

[code]case 172:
// clap emote
triggerTele(2505, 3247, 0, false);
ServerHelp();
break;

		case 166:
			// dance emote
			triggerTele(3420, 3538, 0, false);
			break;

		case 52050:
			triggerTele(2613, 3208, 0, false);
			break;

		case 52051:
			// jig emote
			if (emotes == 0) {
				emotes = 1;
				pEmote = 0x83A;
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			} else {
				emotes = 0;
				pEmote = playerSE;
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			}
			break;

		case 52052:
			// spin emote
			if (emotes == 0) {
				emotes = 1;
				pEmote = 0x83B;
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			} else {
				emotes = 0;
				pEmote = playerSE;
				updateRequired = true;
				appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			}
			break;

[/code]

item.title: Emote
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Right click the emote. Search for that case in client.java.

e.g if my “home” tab emote was 185, then I’d search for case 185.

To rename it, go to Texthandler.java and search for the name of the emote.

Read full topic
